meanings.definition: A room equipped with facilities for washing and relieving oneself, typically including a toilet and sink.
meanings.sent1: The restrooms at the park were clean and well-maintained.
meanings.sent2: I need to use the restrooms before we leave for our road trip.
meanings.sent3: The restrooms were so busy that I had to wait in line to use them.
meanings.sent4: After the long hike, the restrooms felt like a sanctuary.
meanings.sent5: The restrooms had a pleasant scent of fresh flowers.

meanings.definition: A public facility containing restrooms for use by the general public.
meanings.sent1: The shopping mall has restrooms on every floor for the visitors.
meanings.sent2: I always make sure to locate the restrooms when I visit a new place.
meanings.sent3: The restrooms at the beach were surprisingly clean and well-stocked.
meanings.sent4: In the bustling city, the restrooms were a rare oasis of peace.
meanings.sent5: The restrooms in the train station were brightly lit and easy to find.
